citation: Proclamation under the Marine Safety (Domestic Commercial Vessel National Law Application) Act 2013 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Marine Safety (Domestic Commercial Vessel National Law Application) Act 2013

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Marine Safety (Domestic Commercial Vessel National Law Application) Act 2013 fix 1 August 2013 as the day on which section 15(1) and (2) of that Act commence.

8 July 2013

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. J. O'BYRNE

Minister for Infrastructure

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 17 July 2013

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
